title: Bloomberg Markets: Blake Says Athletes Should Speak Out
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Blake Says Athletes Should Speak Out
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010James Blake\u0010Former Professional Tennis Player\u0010Chairman at USTA Foundation\u0010Discussing the U.S. Open and his book "Ways of Grace: Stories of Activism, Adversity and How Sports Can Bring Us Together", inspired by his arrest by a plainclothes New York City police officer, accused of using excessive force.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
